Container.Name: Pre-Seederr
Container.Overview: Pre-Seederr is a lightweight, stateless automation tool designed for cross-seeding. You upload a Tracker A .torrent file, and it automatically searches Prowlarr for a matching release on Tracker B. With a single click, it injects both the downloading file and the paused pre-seed directly into qBittorrent, complete with custom tags and category routing.
Container.Description: Automated cross-seeding and injection tool bridging Prowlarr and qBittorrent.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: The port used to access the Pre-Seederr WebUI.

Config.Name: Appdata Config
Config.Description: Where the configuration file is stored.
